description: Try our easy to follow Silverbeet Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Green salad,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Egg free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Silverbeet Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Finely shred silverbeet and place into a large bowl. Add Fresh Sprouts Mix, finely sliced small red onion, currants and toasted slivered almonds. Toss gently.
Whisk grated rind and juice from orange and olive oil together. Season with salt and pepper. Pour dressing over salad to serve.
